testsuite.name: 用户管理系统测试用例

testcase.name: loginTrue

failure.message:
### Error querying database. Cause: com.mysql.cj.jdbc.exceptions.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure
The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 milliseconds ago. The driver has not received any packets from the server. ### The error may exist in mapper/SQLMapper.xml ### The error may involve com.course.model.loginCase ### The error occurred while executing a query ### Cause: com.mysql.cj.jdbc.exceptions.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure
The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 milliseconds ago. The driver has not received any packets from the server.
